author: guitargeek
body:
#### PR description:

To address issue https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/23030.

The GBRForest classes are so general that they don't really belong to the CondFormats/EgammaObjects package. This PR suggests to split off a GBRForest package from the former EgammaObjects package.

In a followup PR, the remaining EgammaObjects package could be removed, because all other classes except for the GBRForest are unused. I think we can't do both steps in one PR, because deleted CondFormats packages are not correctly "poisoned", and the GBRForest symbols are found in 2 different places then. That's at least the problem I had in the matrix tests.

#### PR validation:

CMSSW compiles, local matrix tests pass.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

No backport intended.
title: New CondFormats/GBRForest package
